spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout distortions detected. The relationship between the kitchen, living room, and garage is fundamentally altered. Room adjacencies do not match the source 2D floor plan significantly.

structural_fidelity.notes: Failed to remove text labels (hallucinated text on floors). While the model floats on a dark background, rooms have been structuraly reinterpreted (e.g., the garage entry and study location).

furniture_mapping.notes: Basic furniture present but often in the wrong rooms or in incorrect quantities (e.g., beds appearing in non-bedroom areas).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good adherence to the low-poly, flat-shaded aesthetic and isometric camera angle. However, the presence of text-like smudges on the floor violates render constraints.

detected_errors.description: Severe layout distortion: kitchen and dining areas are moved from the left side to central/right locations.
Model contains illegible text labels/smudges on the floor surfaces.
Hallucinated structural changes to the garage and entryway compared to the 2D plan.
Missing specific door connections between the garage and the main hallway.
